FAQs.question: What courses do you offer?
FAQs.answer: We offer courses in Web Development, AI, and Data Science.

FAQs.question: Do you provide internships?
FAQs.answer: Yes, after completing a course, you are eligible for an internship.

FAQs.question: How much does the Python course cost?
FAQs.answer: The Python course costs ₹4,999.

FAQs.question: Do I get a certificate after completing a course?
FAQs.answer: Yes, you receive a certificate upon completion.

FAQs.question: Can I get a refund if I don't like the course?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day refund policy.

FAQs.question: Is the internship paid or unpaid?
FAQs.answer: Internships can be paid or unpaid, depending on the company.

FAQs.question: How long does the AI course take to complete?
FAQs.answer: The AI course takes approximately 8 weeks.

FAQs.question: Can I pay in installments?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we offer installment plans through Razorpay.

FAQs.question: Do you have lifetime access to the courses?
FAQs.answer: Yes, you get lifetime access to all purchased courses.

FAQs.question: Are the courses live or recorded?
FAQs.answer: We offer both live and recorded sessions.

FAQs.question: How do I apply for an internship?
FAQs.answer: Complete a course and apply through your dashboard.

FAQs.question: Do you offer a placement guarantee?
FAQs.answer: We provide job assistance but not a guarantee.

FAQs.question: Which programming languages do you teach?
FAQs.answer: We teach Python, JavaScript, and Java.

FAQs.question: How do I enroll in a course?
FAQs.answer: Visit our website, choose a course, and make a payment.

FAQs.question: Can I switch courses after enrolling?
FAQs.answer: Yes, you can switch within the first 7 days.

FAQs.question: Do I need prior coding knowledge?
FAQs.answer: No, we offer beginner-friendly courses.

FAQs.question: What is the eligibility for internships?
FAQs.answer: You must complete at least one course with us.

FAQs.question: Do you provide support during the course?
FAQs.answer: Yes, you get 24/7 support via email and Discord.

FAQs.question: Is there a discount for students?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we offer special discounts for students.

FAQs.question: Can I access courses on mobile?
FAQs.answer: Yes, our platform is mobile-friendly.

FAQs.question: Do you have a coding bootcamp?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we offer a 3-month intensive coding bootcamp.

FAQs.question: Can I get a free trial?
FAQs.answer: We offer free preview lessons for each course.

FAQs.question: What tools will I learn in the Data Science course?
FAQs.answer: You will learn Python, Pandas, NumPy, and TensorFlow.

FAQs.question: How do I contact support?
FAQs.answer: You can email us at support@qualtspire.com.

FAQs.question: Are there any group discounts?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we provide group discounts for 3 or more enrollments.

FAQs.question: Do you offer corporate training?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we offer training for businesses and teams.

FAQs.question: Can I complete a course at my own pace?
FAQs.answer: Yes, all courses are self-paced.

FAQs.question: Are the instructors industry experts?
FAQs.answer: Yes, our instructors have real-world experience.

FAQs.question: Do you offer a UI/UX design course?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we have a dedicated UI/UX design course.

FAQs.question: What career opportunities are available after the courses?
FAQs.answer: You can get jobs in web development, AI, and data science.

FAQs.question: Can I get one-on-one mentoring?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we offer one-on-one mentorship sessions.

FAQs.question: How do I download the course materials?
FAQs.answer: Course materials are available in the dashboard.

FAQs.question: Do you have a referral program?
FAQs.answer: Yes, refer a friend and get discounts.

FAQs.question: How do I upgrade to a higher plan?
FAQs.answer: Go to your dashboard and select the upgrade option.

FAQs.question: Do you offer a cybersecurity course?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we have an ethical hacking and cybersecurity course.

FAQs.question: Are the courses accredited?
FAQs.answer: Our courses are industry-recognized but not university-accredited.

FAQs.question: How long does it take to become a full-stack developer?
FAQs.answer: It takes about 6-8 months with consistent learning.

FAQs.question: Can I get a personalized learning path?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we provide personalized learning recommendations.

FAQs.question: Do you offer project-based learning?
FAQs.answer: Yes, all courses include hands-on projects.

FAQs.question: How do I get my certificate?
FAQs.answer: You can download your certificate from the dashboard after course completion.

FAQs.question: What is the duration of the Web Development course?
FAQs.answer: The Web Development course takes 12 weeks.

FAQs.question: Can I enroll if I'm still in college?
FAQs.answer: Yes, students can enroll in our courses.

FAQs.question: Do you provide freelance opportunities?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we guide students on freelancing.

FAQs.question: Is live doubt-solving available?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we have live doubt-solving sessions.

FAQs.question: Do you offer AWS cloud computing courses?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we have an AWS cloud course.
